sentences.english: The rain flowed into the low-lying land.
sentences.chinese: 雨水都順着山勢流到了塘坳裏。

sentences.english: The little turtle lived in the lotus pond.
Fishing in this pond is forbidden; penalty $5.
sentences.chinese: 塘禁止釣魚，違者罰款五元。

sentences.english: Pollution in Type I pond is very serious, especially, the content of phenol in carp far exceed quota.
sentences.chinese: 型塘水質污染相當嚴重，尤其是鯉魚酚含量嚴重超標。

sentences.english: The final life stage before extinction is a pond .
sentences.chinese: 在衰竭前的最後生命階段，湖泊成爲一個塘。

sentences.english: We had to pass the Whitestone Pond.
sentences.chinese: 回家，我們得經過白石塘。

sentences.english: Waterbird species number and individual density in ponds were higher during drawdown than those before and after drawdown.
sentences.chinese: 在放水過程中，養殖塘中水鳥的種類最多，密度最大。

sentences.english: We passed a pool in which ducks were swimming.
sentences.chinese: 我們走過一個池塘，塘中鴨兒在戲水。

sentences.english: "Long Wang Pond" is a farmer park opened up by farmers with their own money.
sentences.chinese: “龍王塘”是農民自己動手籌建的一個農民公園。

sentences.english: Artificial duck ponds do not count.
sentences.chinese: 人工養鴨塘一類的勿擾。

sentences.english: The muddy pond changed into a beautiful lotus pond after harnessing.
sentences.chinese: 經過治理，這片爛泥塘成了漂亮的荷花塘。

sentences.english: Upwards, we are all at Shangtang Avenue.
Aquacultural ponds are one of the types of artificial wetlands.
sentences.chinese: 水產養殖塘是人工溼地的重要類型之一。

sentences.english: The most amazing is that in the "flatulence pond" next to the old well.
sentences.chinese: 最爲神奇的是在“脹氣塘”旁邊的一口古井。

sentences.english: After five years of gallivanting across the globe, Charles Darwin settled down at Down House in Downe, England.
sentences.chinese: 達爾文在周遊了世界五年後，定居於英國道恩的塘屋。

sentences.english: The rubber gave himimmolation up to the police after two weeks on the run.
sentences.chinese: 阿誰搶劫犯正在塘榆了兩個禮拜後背警圓自尾了。

definition: strip of high ground/low earth dyke separating fields
ridge between fields/row of crops/grave mound/old variant of 壟|垄
pool/pond/bank of a pond/mountain slope/Taiwan pr. [pi2]
